statements: SELECT * FROM wildlife_sightings;
SELECT id, species, location, sighting_date FROM wildlife_sightings WHERE tour_guide = 'John Smith';
SELECT species, COUNT(*) AS total_sightings FROM wildlife_sightings GROUP BY species;
SELECT * FROM wildlife_sightings WHERE sighting_date >= '2022-01-01' AND sighting_date <= '2022-02-28';
SELECT MAX(sighting_date) AS latest_sighting_date FROM wildlife_sightings;
SELECT * FROM wildlife_sightings WHERE species = 'Tiger' ORDER BY sighting_date DESC;
SELECT id, species, location FROM wildlife_sightings WHERE sighting_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT species, COUNT(*) AS sightings_count FROM wildlife_sightings GROUP BY species HAVING sightings_count > 5 ORDER BY sightings_count DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM wildlife_sightings WHERE tour_guide IN ('Jack', 'Emily') ORDER BY location;
SELECT species, sighting_date, conservation_efforts FROM wildlife_sightings WHERE conservation_efforts IS NOT NULL AND sighting_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Wildlife_Sightings WHERE sighting_id = 123;
SELECT animal_name, location FROM Wildlife_Sightings WHERE sighting_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT researcher_name, animal_name, location FROM Wildlife_Sightings WHERE researcher_name = 'Jane Doe';
SELECT * FROM Conservation_Efforts WHERE conservation_category = 'Endangered Species' ORDER BY conservation_date DESC;
SELECT location, conservation_category, COUNT(*) AS total_efforts FROM Conservation_Efforts GROUP BY location, conservation_category;
SELECT * FROM Wildlife_Sightings WHERE sighting_date >= '2021-01-01' AND sighting_date <= '2021-12-31';
SELECT animal_name, location, sighting_date FROM Wildlife_Sightings WHERE location = 'Forest' ORDER BY sighting_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Conservation_Efforts WHERE conservation_category = 'Species Preservation' AND conservation_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY conservation_date ASC;
SELECT researcher_name, COUNT(*) AS total_sightings FROM Wildlife_Sightings GROUP BY researcher_name HAVING total_sightings > 3;
SELECT * FROM Wildlife_Sightings WS JOIN Conservation_Efforts CE ON WS.location = CE.location WHERE WS.sighting_date > '2020-06-01' AND CE.conservation_category = 'Habitat Restoration';
SELECT id, species, date_time FROM wildlife_sightings WHERE researcher = 'John Doe';
SELECT location, species, date_time FROM wildlife_sightings WHERE date_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT location, species, researcher FROM wildlife_sightings WHERE location = 'Forest';
SELECT * FROM conservation_efforts WHERE success = TRUE;
SELECT tour_name, guide, location FROM adventure_tours WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-06-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM wildlife_sightings ORDER BY date_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location, COUNT(species) FROM wildlife_sightings GROUP BY location;
SELECT * FROM conservation_efforts WHERE success = TRUE AND location = 'Amazon Rainforest';
SELECT researcher, COUNT(*) as sighting_count FROM wildlife_sightings GROUP BY researcher ORDER BY sighting_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM adventure_tours WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM wildlife_species;
SELECT species_name, species_category FROM wildlife_species ORDER BY species_name DESC;
SELECT sighting_date, location FROM sightings WHERE species_id = 1;
SELECT guide_name, guide_email, guide_phone FROM tour_guides WHERE guide_id = 3;
SELECT group_name, tour_start_date, tour_end_date FROM tour_groups WHERE tour_end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM wildlife_species WHERE species_category='Mammals';
SELECT species_name, species_category FROM wildlife_species ORDER BY species_name DESC;
SELECT guide_name, guide_email FROM tour_guides WHERE guide_phone LIKE '%555%';
SELECT * FROM tour_groups WHERE tour_start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND tour_end_date <= '2022-12-31';

SELECT sightings.sighting_id, sightings.sighting_date, wildlife_species.species_name, tour_groups.group_name FROM sightings INNER JOIN wildlife_species ON sightings.species_id = wildlife_species.species_id INNER JOIN tour_groups ON sightings.tour_group_id = tour_groups.group_id ORDER BY sightings.sighting_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM sightings;
SELECT species, location, sighted_date FROM sightings ORDER BY sighted_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM conservation_efforts WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date;
SELECT tour_name, guide_name, start_date, end_date FROM adventure_tours WHERE end_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT research_topic, researcher_name FROM research ORDER BY research_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM sightings WHERE species = 'Tiger';
SELECT id, location FROM sightings WHERE sighted_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT species, location FROM sightings WHERE location LIKE '%forest%';
SELECT species, sighted_date FROM sightings ORDER BY sighted_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM conservation_efforts WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
